title: Living outback on a farm
creator_credit: Nandor Jenes, Donald Batchelor and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: Presents a view of life on a wheat farm in the Australian outback. Shows farming activities and indicates the necessity of a good water supply. Also shows the nearby town, local school and a picnic.
description: Presents a view of life on a wheat farm in the Australian outback. Shows farming activities and indicates the necessity of a good water supply. Also shows the nearby town, local school and a picnic.
